ledgermind.title: LedgerMind
ledgermind.summary: AI-powered personal finance agent with explainable ML, RAG insights, encryption via GCP KMS, and Cloudflare-tunnelled Docker stack.
ledgermind.description: Automates categorization and reconciliation, surfaces anomalies and subscriptions, and provides grounded analytics with exportable reports.
outcomes: Encryption at rest with KMS-wrapped DEKs
Charts: month summary, merchants, flows, forecast

datapipe-ai.title: DataPipe AI
datapipe-ai.summary: AI-first data pipelines and RAG utilities for analytics and search; focus on reproducible ingestion and evaluation.
datapipe-ai.description: Turns scattered docs and sources into queryable knowledge with deterministic pipelines and eval tooling.

images.alt: DataPipe AI dashboard showing pipeline management and monitoring

clarity.title: Clarity Companion
clarity.summary: Chrome extension for clarity: ELI5, Focus, Polish, Summarize, Translate, and Write—offline-first with Chrome Built‑in AI.
clarity.description: On‑device assistance for rewriting and focus, with diagnostics, localization, and strict capability fallbacks.
outcomes: Modes: ELI5, Focus, Polish, Summary, Write

images.alt: Clarity Companion panel with localized UI

dermaai.title: DermaAI (SkinSight)
dermaai.summary: Skin-condition assistant UI; community project reference used as inspiration and baseline for dermatology UX.
dermaai.description: Explores image-based triage UX patterns for educational use; not a medical device.

pixo-banana-suite.title: Pixo Banana Suite
pixo-banana-suite.summary: Pixel-art pose/animate toolkit that turns base sprites into idle/walk/run/attack GIFs and sprite sheets.
pixo-banana-suite.description: Rapidly generates clean, crisp animations for game prototypes with consistent cell sizes and columns.
